SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.entities.npcs

Class Merchant

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.FriendlyEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.npcs.Merchant
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemsHolderEntity
public class Merchant extends FriendlyEntity implements ItemsHolderEntity
Represents a merchant NPC in the game.
Merchants can sell PurchasableItem to the player and have a fixed inventory that replenish after every floor
Merchants can be interacted with by the player to access their shop
See Also:
